author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Provided static methods for outputting values in a shortened form.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Minor improvements to output of object diff.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Made sure original description is stored in property for later fetching.
The description will not contain the diff result and allows for re-casting

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Made sure expectation failure exception inherits from PHPUnit2's exception.
This makes it show up as a failure and not an error.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - New invocation matcher at() which matches only at a given invocation index.
# Useful for matching a given parameter at at given invocation index
- Made sure ezcMockMatcher calls the matches() method of the invocation matcher
to allow it to skip a expectation check if needed. (Needed by at() matcher).
- Added alias of stringContains() method called stringContaining() which is
better to use in expectation expressions (sounds better).
- Added support for case-sensitivity in stringContains/stringContaining
- Fixed better error description when a parameter expectation fails. Now the
message contains the description of the invocation matcher and the method
